Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.JSONConversion

Class JSONConverterStoC

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.JSONConversion.JSONConverterStoC
public class JSONConverterStoC extends Object
It's a class that manages the conversion of the server messages into JSON strings
